description:
How to beat performance anxiety and the fear of performing or presenting for live audiences or videos. You will gain skills and become more confident.

Master Techniques Quickly Using Simple and Easy to Learn Methods

  • Recognize the symptoms of stage fright
  • Learn how to turn nervousness into performance energy
  • Turn anxiety to your advantage
  • Put value on your time and skills
  • Share your special talents with others

I designed this course to be put into action right away so that you can begin moving forward and share your message or skills with others. Don't delay, go on to the next phase of your live and master the skills you need to get there.
title: Stage Fright: Winning the Anxiety Battle
